original_title: Bus skids off road: several injured
original_body_lines: A Sri Lanka Transport Board (SLTB) bus plying to Hanwella from Negombo met with an accident on the Wathurugama bus route in Gampaha this morning. The bus skidded off the road due to its speed, police said. 70 passengers were on board during the accident and the injured were admitted to the Gampaha base hospital. Pix by Kushan Pathiraja
